25 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
26  ros::init(argc, argv, "swarmus_turtlebot_bridge");
27  std::shared_ptr<ros::NodeHandle> nodeHandle(new ros::NodeHandle(""));
28 
29  Navigation navigation(nodeHandle);
30 
31  ros::Rate loopRate(RATE_HZ);
32  std::thread navigationThread(navigationLoop, &navigation, loopRate);
33 
34  int port = nodeHandle->param("TCP_SERVER_PORT", 7001);
35  std::string moveByTopic = nodeHandle->param("moveByTopic", std::string("navigation/moveBy"));
36  ros::Publisher moveByPublisher =
37  nodeHandle->advertise<swarmus_turtlebot::MoveBy>(moveByTopic, 1000);
38  Logger logger;
39  HiveMindBridge bridge(port, logger, 5 * RATE_HZ);
40 
41  // Register custom actions
42  CallbackFunction moveByCallback = [&](CallbackArgs args) -> std::optional<CallbackReturn> {
43  swarmus_turtlebot::MoveBy moveByMessage;
44 
45  auto* x = std::get_if<float>(&args[0].getArgument());
46  auto* y = std::get_if<float>(&args[1].getArgument());
47 
48  ROS_INFO("%f", *x);
49 
50  if (x == nullptr || y == nullptr) {
51  ROS_WARN("Received invalid argument type in moveby");
52  return {};
53  }
54 
55  moveByMessage.distance_x = *x;
56  moveByMessage.distance_y = *y;
57 
58  // Publish on moveby
59  moveByPublisher.publish(moveByMessage);
60  return {};
61  };
62 
63  CallbackArgsManifest moveByManifest;
64  moveByManifest.push_back(
65  UserCallbackArgumentDescription("x", FunctionDescriptionArgumentTypeDTO::Float));
66  moveByManifest.push_back(
67  UserCallbackArgumentDescription("y", FunctionDescriptionArgumentTypeDTO::Float));
68  bridge.registerCustomAction("moveBy", moveByCallback, moveByManifest);
69 
70  CallbackFunction getStatus = [&](CallbackArgs args) -> std::optional<CallbackReturn> {
71  // todo This remains to be implemented.
72  int64_t isRobotOk = 1;
73 
74  CallbackArgs returnArgs;
75  returnArgs.push_back(FunctionCallArgumentDTO(isRobotOk));
76 
77  CallbackReturn cbReturn("getStatusReturn", returnArgs);
78 
79  return cbReturn;
80  };
81  bridge.registerCustomAction("getStatus", getStatus);
82 
83  // Register event hooks
84  bridge.onConnect([]() { ROS_INFO("Client connected."); });
85 
86  bridge.onDisconnect([]() { ROS_INFO("Client disconnected."); });
87 
88  while (ros::ok()) {
89  ros::spinOnce();
90  bridge.spin();
91  loopRate.sleep();
92  }
93 
94  return 0;
95 }
